resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Tenor. <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;">Je ne veis onques la pareille/<span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">De vous, ma gratieuse dame.
